content.detailedDescription:
I firmly believe that the objects i filmed on 07/21/2014 are the same objects i filmed on 07/17/2014. i filed a report with video, a map, and a diagram with mufon. it is case # 58217. this case could be considered part of that one even though these events occurred days apart.

on monday, july 21, i was in my backyard observing the sky. i have been doing this regularly since april 16, 2014 when i captured a ufo flying over the northeaster part of the las vegas valley. that ufo and video was submitted to mufon and that case (55525 or 55529 ��� got two numbers from mufon) was proven to be an unknown or a uav after it was investigated by mufon.

for much of the past week i have been seeing flashing or blinking light in the northwestern part of the las vegas valley. specifically i believe they are in the area where highway 95 leaves town north towards reno. these lights are not new to me as i have seen them several times before but never knew they were possible ufo's. on my most recent report to mufon (case # 58217) i had no idea what the objects might be. i have a much better idea now because in my newest video i saw well defined orbs at least three different times. here are the times and duration of each in the video i am submitting.

1. between the 1:28 mark and the 1:31 mark a well defined red orb appears. at the time i didn't know it was there.

2. between the 3:19 mark and 3:57 mark. it was smaller this time but remained constant and didn't blink while i shot video of it.

3. between the 8:12 mark and the 8:15 mark. a well defined yellow orb appears and moves off the screen.

4. between the 8:39 mark and 9:08 mark. this orb appears to be more of a gray color and had brief instances where some red appear. this is also the orb that makes me thing that the rest of the blinkers are orbs because this one started to flash again at the very moment the orb fades out and in the exact same location.

earlier in the evening i was watching numerous aircraft return to nellis air force base in long drawn out lines that are part of the 414th combat training squadron "red flag" exercises. this kept going all the way until about midnight. high above the aircraft returning to nellis i could see as many as 20 of these blinkers through my binoculars. they seemed to just be hovering. i attempted to shoot video but it didn't work because i couldn't see them with my eyes and my galaxy s4 camera was to weak to pick them up either. 

it wasn't until later on in the night that i came back outside and now noticed them much closer to me and were easy to see visually. that's when i began shooting video again. it was tough because they were all over the mountains that sit just west and northwest of my home. i did my best to capture what i could. this went on for about 17 minutes.
content.summary: Flashing or blinking lights, orbs noticed, one orb began flashing in video.

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, july 11th, at 4:30 pm while camping , subject and two other people saw a bright object shooting across the sky. subject got his binoculars and saw the object was cigar shaped and shiny, reflecting the gold of the sun off its reflective hull.  subject said he saw six to eight blacked out areas on cigar shaped object, maybe windows or structure. subject said object was four times bigger than a  747 air craft. subject estimates it was traveling northwest to southeast at forty thousand feet. subject has seen blackbird aircraft and said ufo was traveling faster than a blackbird.  subject said he watched the cigar shaped ufo disappear in the high cloud cover and not come out the other side 
subject lives near army and air force bases and recognizes military aircraft in the sky.  subject regularly watches the sky and identifies the space station.
content.summary: Subject and wife and friend were camping and saw a glowing object in streaking accross the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from a birthday party sitting in the passenger seat of my mothers car. we were stopped at a red light. i was looking at the clouds because the storm had finally stopped and i was admiring the cloud cover. i first noticed these lights appearing in he clouds that were becoming more distinct. the actual shape finally became visible but was still slightly covered by clouds. i immediately thought it was a ufo based on its shape and the way it traveled. it descended about 10ft until the body was visible. it was north compared to me and as it ascended the lights moved northwest. after about three more seconds the ship completely disappeared. i was shocked. it wasn't my first odd experience. i said to my mom "holy crap are you seeing this, mom look." i was pointing in the direction but she was too late to look up. after i finished yelling she looked up and the craft was gone. i lost sight of the object because it ascended back into the cloud cover.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Wide circular craft with close to 25 lights around the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: As me and my friends were organizing a barbecue i was sitting outside on the patio with my one friend. i was staring up at the sky when i noticed an object traveling very fast through the sky. at first i assumed it was a plane because of the proximity of my friends house to the city center airport, but then i noticed the absence of any engine sound. at the speed it was traveling at i believed it could not have been any kind of turbo-propeller aircraft, it had to have had a power plant similar to that of a fighter jet. but there was no sound. as my suspicion grew i tried to draw the attention of my friend sitting right next to me, but because of the speed and apparent small size of the object he was unable to see the object. i then reached for my cell phone to try and snap a picture of the object but the camera was unable to focus on the object. i tracked the object as it flew across the sky, it had a solid triangular shape, like a delta wing, about as large as  a fighter jet, it was dark in color presumably dark grey and was flying at an altitude just below the cloud cover that day. i lost sight of the as it continued flying west. this all happened within the span of about 3 minutes maybe less. i initially shook it off as a bird, but over the past i thought about what i saw. i've always had a love for aircraft and i could tell the difference between an airbus a380 and a boeing 747. what i saw that day was either some kind of new experimental aircraft, or something that belongs on an episode of ufo hunters.
content.summary: Observed flying very quickly at a high altitude almost silent

content.detailedDescription:
Subject and friend were flying a (l4 grasshopper) military version, airplane in texas over liberty hill, from burnnet to kitty hill airport.  subjects were followed by an aircraft carrier sized, saucer shaped, ufo for 15 minutes.
the ufo had white lit orbs flying around it.  it was colored whitish grey with a shine or shimmer around it.  the ufo affected the magnetic compass aboard the aircraft which had no other instrumentation aboard it.  the aircraft sighted a cessna, which they talked to, and also saw the ufo.  the plane landed safely at kitty hill airport.  both subjects on board were very shaken and disturbed.  pilot consulted his flight manual to report the ufo and found it didn't have sufficient information for him, manual told him to contact local law enforcement.  he googled, report a ufo, and found mufon.
subject obviously wants to remain anonymous because he is a pilot and fears repercussions. subject said he would have his flying partner try to fill out a mufon report and tell his version of what he saw.  subject will contact mufon hq if he changes his mind about being anonymous or wished to add to his report.
content.summary: Pilot was flying a l4 grasshopper/ air plane had a aircraft carrier size disc with orbs flying around it tail them for 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
On aug 3rd of 2013 i filmed a video of a sky with beautiful white clouds. the following day i downloaded it to my personal computer.  watching it at regular speed to a very long time.  almost at the end of the film i started to seem white orbs moving around.  so i cut that section out of the film and saved the original film from the camera.  

while editing the film you can plainly see the white orb in the blue area of the sky.  some very small some larger.  so i then slowed down the speed of the section of film 9 time slower the what the human eye can see.  to my amazement there were more orbs then what i didn't notice before.  the wow affect you might say.

i then saw a black flat object coming from the right to the left in the film, which i slowed that down the best that the program i use and it looked like a black saucer.  so i found that area and use the snip tool and got a still of the image which shows a saucer.  

i have all this information saved on my pc and i am asking anyone from wisconsin office (mufon) to contact me about this matter.  i will show them all the images of the video as well as doing any test they may fill to clear this matter up.

mufon may contact me on my phone number which is posted on this report.

thank you for you time
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Filmed off my patio

content.detailedDescription: While i was outside cooking on my grill i suddenly had a very large ufo light up to avoid an accident with a jet airliner after the jet cleared the ufo went dark again and could not be seen or heard i also wanted to ask a mufon representative to come to my home as i feel i have some very interesting information that i can not put on the net or over the phone
content.summary: Ufo turned on white marker lights as to avoid accident with jet airliner

content.detailedDescription: Came home from a late night cruise in my car, and my eyes were im mediately drawn up to the sky. it was then i saw the first "ufo". bright randomly flashing lights that seemed to swirl and flash all over the "craft". moved much slower than the planes i'm used to seeing. and silently at that. there was no cloud cover at all and i had an unobstructed view of its whole pass overhead. just as soon as it was out of sight, a second, and then a third followed the exact same path with even spacing and speed. i see alot of plane traffic around my area, but these weren't plane lights that i saw. the intensity and frequency of the flashes was much higher than anything i've seen before and over a greater area of the "craft". they also seemed to be much lower than planes normally fly yet, were completely silent. the whole event was very strange. like i was supposed to see them. its hard to explain, i mean, i wasn't looking up and then noticed it. i was looking at the ground and its like something made me look right at it.
content.summary: Observed three

content.detailedDescription:
I was at roof of my home with my doggie when i saw lights just 2 then i could hear it's sound huge jetlike roar.It came closer i could see many lights and object had a round or say a circuler shape.So i called my sister up.My mother came few seconds after it crossed over our head.Me and my sister saw it heading straight from south then crossing over right over us and keep going north.We saw it 3 times in like 30 minutes to 1 hour.Exactly middle of 10:30 to 11 pm.I saw like 10 lights in total.First time it was much closer or it was so big that it looked closer.Then in few minutes same looking or same ship crossed again from to same direction this time after it was gone we heard air plane noises 3 times.It's roar was like vibrating so loud.Other fighter jets or air line jets are nothing like it.Then 3rd time i was downstairs when my sis called me up.This time 3 or 4 other planes or ship but way smaller in size were following it.But before it crossed my city i'm sure i saw 1 of smaller ships went much closer to that big ship.Smaller ships were getting closer but please read it carefully because of that big ship in there and it's sound we couldn't hear small ship sound.So we can't tell they were indian air force ,air line or had different noise 

my ancestors never believed in gods.We have always had open mind.We always believed in life on other planets.So when we saw it we wanted to explain it as better detail as possible.We talked about it and now i'm 23 reporting it.

i tried to take pic but it was too dark and my mobile could not see almost anything.
content.summary: First i heard roar then saw lights in a round shaped object as closer they got as number and amount increased of lights

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and u were on the front porch of the house in quinlan,tx on several different nights.We always took the dog out about 10 pm every might.Starring in esry may, 2014, we started noticing that some of the stars we were talking about started to move way up in the sky. we thought we were seeing things at first so we went and got my son to all of them were flashing in am exsct sewuence with a stationary ' star" thst was in the middle of the verify what we seeing. he verified that we were in fact seeing it! the first one appeared to be stationary for several minutes and then started moving for south to zmorth in a straight kine directly above us. a second one appeared for north to south also in a straight line. a third one appeared in the north but was ascending upward and suddenly slowly started moving to the south and a viuoke more seemed to be dropping down toward the ground and changed to the north.
content.summary: Several starlike lights from differemt directions all flying in straight paths toward ome stationary"star".All flashimg in sequence wirh " star". all disappeared at same time

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and u were on the front porch of the house in quinlan,tx on several different nights.We always took the dog out about 10 pm every might.Starring in esry may, 2014, we started noticing that some of the stars we were talking about started to move way up in the sky. we thought we were seeing things at first so we went and got my son to all of them were flashing in am exsct sewuence with a stationary ' star" thst was in the middle of the verify what we seeing. he verified that we were in fact seeing it! the first one appeared to be stationary for several minutes and then started moving for south to zmorth in a straight kine directly above us. a second one appeared for north to south also in a straight line. a third one appeared in the north but was ascending upward and suddenly slowly started moving to the south and a viuoke more seemed to be dropping down toward the ground and changed to the north.
content.summary: Several starlike lights from differemt directions all flying in straight paths toward ome stationary"star".All flashimg in sequence wirh " star". all disappeared at same time

content.detailedDescription:
Please see attached document of event.

content.summary: Witness  spotted a deep solid object orange color/orb, with attached tail and irregular pointed shape.

content.detailedDescription: On 07/21/14 around 9pm a tv show i watch was coming on when the dog needed to go outside. before i go on, i grew up near the local airport, so i know what landing gear lights look like, altitudes of planes, gas or jet motors etc. so i take the dog out and im standing on the front porch and i notice 2 sets of lights, one traveling north the other east. they were close, i honestly thought i was about to see  a mid-air collision.  the 1st object stayed its course while the 2nd passed by and started a turn towards the 1st obect. what i noticed about the 1st object was its lights, 3 whites  and 3 white lights below in a rectangle pattern. i watched it for a few seconds then i decided to get off the porch to get a better view. by this time the 2nd object had caught up to the 1st and unless it was military, was following the 1st object very close. with the jet noise and light pattern, the 2nd object was obviously a jet. so i go out in the yard as the 2 pass overhead and over my house, at this point a large pine tree obstructed my view. this is also where the separation occured. when i next saw them the jet had turned and was headed southeast, the 1st object headed south then turned and headed southwest, at this point i saw my brother [vet crew chief usaf] in the house and called him out. he said that was not a jet. it then went into a cloud bank and behind mountaian out of view.
content.summary: Ufo over southern wv???

content.detailedDescription: Was getting ready to go to bed at 11:15pm and looked out the window at sky to see if it was cloudy or not. saw a bright light coming in a northeast to southwest direction. window was open as it was a nice night and we had shut the a?C off. there was no noise from the object. it had no faa required lights. just this white light. as i watched, a meteorite shot past in a opposite direction crossing the path of the light. the light passed out of sight over my house and there was never a noise. we live near a air base and i was in the air force. we have c-17 and c-5m aircraft at the base. but these are large transport craft. there were no other planes in the area at the time. all was quiet. this is the second time i have observed a questionable sighting were i live. the first was about 10 years ago in the daytime. i saw a shiny craft at high altitude in the southwest sky that just seem to gain more altitude and disappear in to the cloud ceiling. also no noise then either.
content.summary: Observed in sky out my open front window

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back deck outside of my bedroom having a smoke before i went to bed just looking at the stars when i noticed a blue ball of light moving form the south east of the valley to the south west of the valley at first i thought it was a helicopter but then noticed that there was was no noise and no running lights and it was moving to fast it went from one side of the valley  to the other in less than 2 mins at one point it stopped then shot straight up into the sky and disappeared i started yelling to my wife "omg you are not going to believe this" i woke her up and told her what happened
content.summary: Bright blue ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Very bright red light traveling so fast that when i seen it, it took less than 3 seconds and it was gone from my sight. i first notice a red light over amazon in middletown then light was gone then light flashed again in less than a second far from amazon closer to me then the next time it flashed it was directly to my right very large bright red light that left a trial the next time i seen it, it had moved so fast that the time it took me to move my head to try and see it flash, only my side vision was able to see it flash to the right of me and if i had to guess, at least 3 miles in the sky in less that a split second, i have never seen anything in my life move so fast it shook me up a bit to see it. it all happened so fast if i blinked i would have missed it. this object had no white light for traveling at night only a flashing red light.
content.summary: Very bright red light flashed four times traveling at a impossible speed

content.detailedDescription:
Around 12:15 a.M. on july 23, 2014, i was walking to my door in southeastern orem, utah. for the record, i am a 27-year-old female. i was wearing glasses, but saw what i saw with them both on and off. i was looking at the sky because it was a very clear night and noticed a light to the west that was equivalent to the brighter stars. it was moving around in a flitting pattern, much like an insect, but on a smaller scale. i stood and watched it for about 10 minutes and then sat down to commence watching. 

the light looked like a star, but seemed to have flickers of either red or yellow sporadically. at times it looked like a smaller light split up from the top, but that might just have been my eyes. i had seen two airplanes prior to this light and it looked nothing like either of them. as i was watching around 12:35, a third plane flew by. the light was brighter than those of that particular airplane, yet it was much further away. i am basing the distance estimates on that the amount the light moved in comparison to the plane. they were moving at about equal speeds. i also saw a satellite and what i presume was a helicopter. it looked nothing like them, either. at 12:41, my boyfriend (25) reported that he could see it from southwestern provo, utah, one city over.

around 12:45, i was recording it on my phone. before i could turn on the recording button, it looked like four smaller pinkish lights fusing into one (the pinkness, i am pretty certain, is from the phone). that might just have been my phone, but it didn���������t do it again. as i was filming it, the light just disappeared altogether. i stopped filming and a few moments later it was back in the sky. (note: on the film, it looks like the movement could be due to shakiness. i held it as steadily as i could. if anything, any movement on my part cancelled out some of its. i did not zoom in. the camera also makes it appear further away than it was. the light was moving more noticeable distances in person.)

at 12:48, i moved and noticed a smaller light that had been covered by a tree. it was also moving in a similar fashion, though it was smaller and not as bright. it was down and a bit to the north from the first light. i held out my arm and the distance between the two was about equal to that of my thumb, erring on the side of a little closer. (i���������m a woman.) 

at 12:55, i went inside to get my telescope. i noticed another smaller moving light a bit higher up in the sky and to the south. its movements were not as drastic as the first one, which along with its size made me believe it was further away. it looked a little more bluish.

by 12:58, i was back outside setting up my telescope. all three lights were still present. i���������m an amateur and out of practice, so i had a hard time honing in on the light. it didn���������t help that it was moving. twice i had it move across my lens, but it wasn���������t focused. the light appeared to have a pinkish tint, though. i made my best guess at what settings would make it focused and looked in the same spot for a few minutes. it didn���������t show up through my lens again.

at 1:26, i went back inside. at the time i left, two lights were still visible. the first light had migrated a little bit down and to the north. it was not a great distance, though. it had retained the same disorganized pattern of movement the whole time. the second light had moved along with the first and was no longer visible from my spot, but was likely just covered by the house next to mine. the third light was still to the south. i immediately commenced writing this report upon reentering the house.
content.summary: I saw an object looking like a bright star moving around like an insect for over an hour. there were also two smaller ones.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my famialy have been seeing lights above the palo verde nuclaer genarating station for sevral nights
content.summary: Unidentified lights apear and dissapear in diffrent places above palo verde nuclear plant

content.detailedDescription: Come from the east, diverted over the water tower and leveled out, had a (lookalike) afterburner, no sound, moving faster then mock 7, close enuf to see details.
content.summary: Faster then mach 4, jet like without noise or wings

content.detailedDescription: Was letting my dogs out before going to bed at midnight. i was looking around up into the sky, checking the weather and stars. as i looked in a westernly direction i saw flashing lights that i assumed were an airplane. i continued to watch the lights and they didnt move for almost an hour. i tried to get video on my phone, but wasn't too sucessful. i observed it through binoculars and observerd red/ green/blue lights flashing on it. i woke my friend,  whom was staying with m, and he also observed it through the binoculars. i went online around 1:10am to report it. since ive been on here reporting it, i went back outside and observed it had finally move a little more north of where it had been. but was still hovering. it is now 1:31am and it is still there. i'm going to bed now.
content.summary: Saw flashing red/green/blue lights @285°heading from my home.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from work on the evening of august 21, 2013. i remember the date because i had heard on the radio that day president obama  was visiting buffalo ny. the time was approximately 9:00pm.   the sky was just darkening.    

i had just come onto the qew (queen elizabeth way) and was preparing to merge into the traffic flow.  i was travelling eastbound from the kipling ave. access lane.  traffic was fairly light this evening. my driver's side window was fully open. i checked over my left shoulder for traffic prior to beginning my merge.   as i turned to regain a full view of the road, a glowing green/white orb passed in front of the car with tremendous speed.  the object came from the south and headed to the north gaining elevation. it's direction appeared to be taking it towards a plane flying east.  the plane may have been at 5000ft at this point. the airport is only a few miles away and so i assumed it must have just left the airport.  the plane was far from the highway. 

there was no traffic in front of me so i was able to observe it for about a minute.  it appeared that the object might get very close to the plane, but it flew into some clouds and "winked out".  that was the last i saw of it.  the entire duration of the observation i believe was less than a minute.   

the object itself, when it passed in front of my vehicle, appeared to be the size of a beach ball. it was close to my vehicle but i don't know how close it actually was.  everything happened too quickly.  the object startled me as it passed, but i don't recall being fearful of it. it was moving at a tremendous speed and it was absolutely silent.  the glow from the object was not blinding. rather, it was a soft glow.  

after the object disappeared, i recall my first reaction was to laugh.  i thought to myself, if it was looking for buffalo and the president, it was lost. far off course!   i was also filled with a sense of marvel at the speed and beauty of the object.  it was absolutely beautiful.  

i checked the newspapers and listened to the radio the next day in hope of hearing some report. i find it difficult to believe i was the only person that saw this object cross the expressway.  i saw and heard nothing from the media.   i have made the assumption, that because the president was in the area, so was this object.  i would be curious to learn if there was any activity reported in the area between buffalo and toronto.
content.summary: The object flew in front of my car and across 9 lanes of expressway in the direction of an plane flying eastward

content.detailedDescription: On july 4th 2014 , around 9pm , as we were watching the fireworks from daniels park (highlands ranch) , i was filming with my video camera , and all of a sudden i saw these 4 lights way out in the distance floating around and changing direction for about 2 minutes , i filmed the whole event . the news channel later said that there was a parachute show , and that the parachute jumpers had flares attached to there feet , but i just don't know if that is exactly what we observed , because these light were changing formation and such .
content.summary: Looking north from daniels park , we observed 4 lights changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming into my apartment near battlefield and golden in springfield mo when the light caught my attention. it was kind of eerie but very intriguing. there was no sound as i watch an orange cigar shaped light travel south to north the ascent instantly. i would say it was less than 5 minutes from when i first noticed it until it disappeares. this was not a firework. i am a paranormal investigator so i was looking for other sightings like this in the area and found some and am wondering if this has been attributed to a known aircraft. thanks.
content.summary: Silent orange cigar shaped light on a path the quickly ascended.

content.detailedDescription: on the night of july 20, i was at the great south bay music festival.As bb king was being escorted to the stage,a lady in front of me pointed to the sky. i was puzzled because all eyes were on the stage. i was under a tent, so i moved to the edge of the canvas, looked up and i really could not believe what i saw! it was so close in the sky,and as clear an image as you would want. about maybe 5000 ft.Up was an object that had a cross of lights.One row was red, and the other was green.Above the lights was the object itself. the bottom of the object looked to be four square boxes inside one bigger box.It might have had another outside perimiter, either round or square,i could not tell.Also i judged the object to be no more than 50 to 75 ft. in diameter. it was so close! i don t know if someone from the general public, or the us gov. was messing around, but i would like to find out. people at the festival seemed to be oblivious of its presents in the sky. i have never seen anything like it,i was amazed! if it was made by someone, i would love to shake his hand!!! outstanding job!
content.summary: At music festival, object was observed directly over head at low alt., then moved sw .  a cross  of lights.    red then green ,one going one way, one going the other. object on top of lights. square???

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the street in front of my house watching fireworks on july 4. from my house, fireworks can usually be observed from any direction at any given time. at one point, i turned facing north to watch some fireworks when i noticed a red-orange orb shaped object fairly low in the horizon. it was lower than the fireworks that were being set off in that direction. the object was somewhat large and was moving quickly from the north/northwest to southeast. i was able to observe the object for about 5 seconds or so before i lost sight of it behind houses and trees. during the time i observed the object, it did not change color or direction. it maintained a steady line of direction and speed.

at first i thought the object might have been a chinese lantern or similar device, but there was no wind or breeze and the object did not give the appearance that it was floating. then i thought it possibly might have been the exhaust from a jet aircraft, but i did not see any flashing navigation lights on the object and it made no sound. even though there were fireworks going off in the area, there was usually several seconds or more between each display. at this point, i was not sure what i was seeing. i know that it was not part of any fireworks display and it did not seem like any aircraft that i am familiar with in this area, so i just considered it to be something odd.

i did not really think anything more about this until a couple of days ago when i was looking through the mufon database for the latest sightings and read about an event in hampstead, md, posted july 19, 2014, that occurred at about the same time and had a similar description. i believe that the object that i saw is the same as the one in the hampstead report. hampstead, md is approximately 20 miles northeast of where i live.
content.summary: Observed red-orange orb traveling from n/nw to se

content.detailedDescription: It was the night kym kardashian was on the j leno show. it was  before kym came on to set with j leno maybe anywhere from 5 to 15 minutes before she was on the stage. at the above address across the river from the yard of the address. the white orb flew over a cow field. it took about 3 hours before the craft was practically just a little n of me closer then what seem to be a football field distance away maybe about the 50 yard line distance away/above from the ground. all i know is that ufo was dippin through outer space for light years just to find me and then do something between me and kim kardashian like transfering dna or something of that matter. do to my knowledge of understanding that after it was gone i was megnectly or elelctrly stuck to the floor of my house and was in and out of a white black area in my mind and i didnt wake up until after the show was completely over. and i had an awake vision of a beautiful lady dressed in a fur robe with a robotical leg giving me a kiss on the cheek. im the one who rhymed to snoop dogg in 2010 saw alot of ufos then ive actually had about 25 ufo sightings in my lifetime. atleast 25. that ufo was travelin what i think is nw to ne. or it was just the iss.
content.summary: Epic amazing perfect timing on my part and theres. every  time i saw one

content.detailedDescription: I was at the santa fe university art and design. it was about 9 pm. there was a talent show and i got bored and laid down to the grass. started to see the stars, suddenly one of the stars started moving, the another, then another and so on. at least i've seen 11 ufos moving in different directions and coming together. two of them got away really fast at a speed of an asteroid or something like that. after 15 minutes, the clouds covered them.
content.summary: Sighting at night from santa fe university of art and design

content.detailedDescription: Sometime during the mid to late 1970s, my brother and i were outside my parents house playing in the trees.  from my parents house at this time, one could clearly see loring afb and several structures on the base including the arch hanger, radar tower, water towers etc.  hearing b-52s take off and land was common for us but we would normally watch them taking off.  you could clearly see the black trail of smoke behind them.  on this particular day, we heard jets flying but we knew they weren't b-52s, they sounded more like fighters and we were excited by the sounds they were making like when a jet banks at high speed and makes that screeching sound as they turn.  so, we ran out from the woods to see the jets but we also saw what i can only compare to the red dot that a laser pointer creates, hovering over the base.  the jets were flying towards this bright red object at a high rate of speed and as they approached the object it almost instantly moved from a stand still to a point at the opposite end of the base, a distance of probably 2 to 4 miles, and it made this movement in an instant and then came to a complete stop.  the jets (now banking at the other end of the base) turned to go back towards the object again.  this happened probably 2 or 3 times.  this happened during the daylight hours but i'm not sure what time of day.  we were only 8 or 9 years old at the time.  eventually the object either disappeared or flew off so fast that it was gone in an instant.  the fact that this object started and stopped so suddenly was amazing.  the jets appeared to be moving in slow motion compared to this object.  that's it...We both remember this happening very clearly.  i just watched an episode of 'close encounters:examinde' on the scifi channel which depicted this event or another one very similar to what we say.  the only differences i could see were that on the tv show, the events all happened at night but it was definitely during the day when we saw it.  we also only saw this on one occasion, not several like on the tv episode.  thanks for reading.
content.summary: Similar to laser pointer red dot over loring afb being pursued by military aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
My good friend was at the river, camping. he was on his boat taking pictures of the sunset. in one of the photos there is a ufo type craft hovering in a nook, above the water, below the tree line. the object appears as a metallic purple/violet sphere.
the object was not noticed till after the fact, while viewing the photos. the object is in the distance, near the tree line, in the center of the photo
content.summary: Image appeared in a photo that was taken at sunset over the river.

content.detailedDescription: Zoom this pic and find out a thing above cloud a small point.
content.summary: Zoom pic and find out in above cloud
